tenxsom_ai_trending_content_pipeline.concept: Trend-based content generation for multi-platform automation

assets.prompt: Modern AI developer workspace, multiple curved monitors displaying code and neural network visualizations, RGB backlighting, futuristic holographic interfaces, trending cyberpunk aesthetic, 4K ultra-detailed
assets.use_case: Tech tutorials, coding content, AI education videos

assets.prompt: Bitcoin rocket ship launching through digital clouds, golden cryptocurrency coins floating, trending bull market aesthetic, neon green charts in background, futuristic finance visualization, dramatic lighting
assets.use_case: Crypto news, market analysis, trading content

assets.prompt: Scandinavian minimalist morning routine, warm natural lighting, ceramic coffee cup on marble countertop, iPhone and MacBook arranged aesthetically, plants in background, trending clean aesthetic
assets.use_case: Lifestyle content, productivity tips, morning routines

assets.prompt: Hyper-realistic AI virtual influencer, perfect features, trendy outfit, recording content with ring light and professional camera setup, holographic AI logo floating nearby, trending social media aesthetic
assets.use_case: AI showcase, tech reviews, virtual content creation

next_steps.video_generation: Use asset IDs as startAssetId for video creation once 402 error is resolved
next_steps.content_strategy: Each image serves as seed for 5-10 video variations
next_steps.estimated_content_output: 40+ videos per week across all platforms
